casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Dreu FERGUSON Jr., a/k/a Drew Ferguson, Defendant-Petitioner. C-604 September Term 2017
079982 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 9, 2018 **152To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005225-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

**153It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
